en: Have you ever talked to Venu?
Will he do any help to us?
He will do if you ask.
You ask anybody; you will hear only good about him.
You are going to the market, aren't you?
If you see him anywhere ask him to meet me.
He will get angry if anybody talks bad about any of his friends.
I will not talk bad about anybody.
Will you be at home in the evening?
Don't tell to anybody anything in this matter.
Why will I tell this to anybody?
I know (that I shouldn't tell this to others), don't I?
What's the matter? Both of you are here!
We are not looking for anybody else.
By hook or crook, you must help me.
I wrote a letter to you. Did you get it?
You might have put it in any of the books.
He didn't put it in any book.
Subbarao said that he would come at 12 o'clock.
He told me that he would come at one o'clock.
Then, did you tell this thing to Gopalarao?
Did you find out why Subbarao didn't come?
How can we manage if you don't find out?
How do we do if you delay like this?
My younger brother fell down from the chair.
Why did you bandage your finger?
His toy fell on my palm.
My finger is paining a little.
any (an indefinite pronominal marker added to question words)
